title: Hair Tutorial: Sleek Pompadour with Braun Satin-Hair 7 SensoCare & SensoDryer
description: We all like to make an entrance and today’s look oozes elegance straight from the runway.  Be ‘catwalk’ ready wherever your evening takes you. Sascha recommends starting by lightly blow drying your hair with the SensoDryer diffuser to give volume to your

asset.author: Braun
asset.hookText:
We all like to make an entrance and today’s look oozes elegance straight from the runway.  Be ‘catwalk’ ready wherever your evening takes you. Sascha recommends starting by lightly blow drying your hair with the SensoDryer diffuser to give volume to your hair.

How to hairstyles for long hair with the Braun SensoDryer & SensoCare styler: 
Step 1
Start by blow drying your hair with the SensoDryer professional nozzle. 

Step 2
Split the front section into 3 parts. Backcomb the middle section and then do the same to the sides. 

Step 3
Build the quiff: Take the top sections and start to twist firmly to form the shape. Then fix your hair in place with bobby pins. 

Step 4
Straighten the rest of the hair. The SensoCare straightener adjusts temperature as you style for ultimate heat protection, ensuring perfectly sleek and healthy-looking hair. 
 
Find more trendy hairstyles:
#hairtutorial Big volume with waves: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TM5-3v1II-Y&index=1&list=PLnjhc4UmS9C09t3qERa2MnfYqNDL9vzE8
#hairtutorial Messy Bun: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nsjalIUHuDI&index=3&list=PLnjhc4UmS9C09t3qERa2MnfYqNDL9vzE8

Buy Braun Satin-Hair 7 SensoCar styler: http://www.braun.com/global/hair-care/Satin-Hair-straighteners/Satin-Hair-7-sensocare-styler/Satin-Hair-7-sensocare.html

Get more info on Braun Hair Care: http://www.braun.com/global/hair-care.html
